languages.text: "Когда я вновь узрела свет, я принесла Ему клятву: преследовать Аспис и негодяев, подобных ей, до последнего вздоха. Расправа над еретиками и нечестивцами — таков теперь мой путь".

traits.locale_text: "Когда я вновь узрела свет, я принесла Ему клятву: преследовать Аспис и негодяев, подобных ей, до последнего вздоха. Расправа над еретиками и нечестивцами — таков теперь мой путь".

languages.text: "When I beheld light again, I swore an oath to Him — to pursue Aspyce and other miscreants like her till my last breath. To castigate heretics and offenders of faith — such is my path now."
languages.original_text: "Когда я вновь узрела свет, я принесла Ему клятву: преследовать Аспис и негодяев, подобных ей, до последнего вздоха. Расправа над еретиками и нечестивцами — таков теперь мой путь".

traits.locale_text: "When I beheld light again, I swore an oath to Him — to pursue Aspyce and other miscreants like her till my last breath. To castigate heretics and offenders of faith — such is my path now."
"When I beheld light again, I swore an oath to Him — to pursue Aspyce and other miscreants like her till my last breath. To castigate heretics and offenders of faith — such is my path now."
"When I beheld light again, I swore an oath to Him — to pursue Aspyce and other miscreants like her till my last breath. To castigate heretics and offenders of faith — such is my path now."
"When I beheld light again, I swore an oath to Him — to pursue Aspyce and other miscreants like her till my last breath. To castigate heretics and offenders of faith — such is my path now."
"When I beheld light again, I swore an oath to Him — to pursue Aspyce and other miscreants like her till my last breath. To castigate heretics and offenders of faith — such is my path now."

languages.text: 「私は再び光を見たとき、皇帝に誓ったのだ――最後の一息まで、アスパイスとその同類の異端者どもを追い続けると。異端者、そして信仰に対する違反者を厳しく追及する――それが今の私の道だ」
languages.original_text: "When I beheld light again, I swore an oath to Him — to pursue Aspyce and other miscreants like her till my last breath. To castigate heretics and offenders of faith — such is my path now."

traits.locale_text: 「私は再び光を見たとき、皇帝に誓ったのだ――最後の一息まで、アスパイスとその同類の異端者どもを追い続けると。異端者、そして信仰に対する違反者を厳しく追及する――それが今の私の道だ」

languages.text: “当我重见光明时，我便向神皇起誓——我这一生都将追捕阿斯拜丝与其他像她那样的邪恶之徒。我要严惩异端分子与叛道者，这就是我所选择的道路。”
languages.original_text: "When I beheld light again, I swore an oath to Him — to pursue Aspyce and other miscreants like her till my last breath. To castigate heretics and offenders of faith — such is my path now."

traits.locale_text: “当我重见光明时，我便向神皇起誓——我这一生都将追捕阿斯拜丝与其他像她那样的邪恶之徒。我要严惩异端分子与叛道者，这就是我所选择的道路。”

languages.text: «Cuando por fin volví a ver la luz, presté juramento al Emperador: perseguiría a Aspyce y a otros criminales como ella mientras viviera. Castigar a los herejes y a otros enemigos de la fe es mi camino».
languages.original_text: "When I beheld light again, I swore an oath to Him — to pursue Aspyce and other miscreants like her till my last breath. To castigate heretics and offenders of faith — such is my path now."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando por fin volví a ver la luz, presté juramento al Emperador: perseguiría a Aspyce y a otros criminales como ella mientras viviera. Castigar a los herejes y a otros enemigos de la fe es mi camino».

languages.text: « Quand enfin j'ai retrouvé la lumière, j'ai juré sur Son nom de chasser Aspyce et les mécréants comme elle jusqu'à mon dernier souffle. Châtier les hérétiques et les dévoyés de la foi, telle est ma mission. »
languages.original_text: "When I beheld light again, I swore an oath to Him — to pursue Aspyce and other miscreants like her till my last breath. To castigate heretics and offenders of faith — such is my path now."

traits.locale_text: « Quand enfin j'ai retrouvé la lumière, j'ai juré sur Son nom de chasser Aspyce et les mécréants comme elle jusqu'à mon dernier souffle. Châtier les hérétiques et les dévoyés de la foi, telle est ma mission. »

languages.text: "Als ich wieder Licht erblickte, leistete ich einen Schwur an Ihn – Aspyce und andere Häretiker wie sie bis zu meinem letzten Atemzug zu verfolgen. Ketzer und Verräter des Glaubens zu bestrafen – und das ist nun mein Pfad."
languages.original_text: "When I beheld light again, I swore an oath to Him — to pursue Aspyce and other miscreants like her till my last breath. To castigate heretics and offenders of faith — such is my path now."

traits.locale_text: "Als ich wieder Licht erblickte, leistete ich einen Schwur an Ihn – Aspyce und andere Häretiker wie sie bis zu meinem letzten Atemzug zu verfolgen. Ketzer und Verräter des Glaubens zu bestrafen – und das ist nun mein Pfad."

languages.text: "Işığı tekrar gördüğümde, son nefesime kadar Aspyce ve onun gibi zalimlerin peşinden gideceğime yemin ettim. Artık yolum, sapkınları ve inanç mücrimlerini cezalandırmak oldu."
languages.original_text: "When I beheld light again, I swore an oath to Him — to pursue Aspyce and other miscreants like her till my last breath. To castigate heretics and offenders of faith — such is my path now."

traits.locale_text: "Işığı tekrar gördüğümde, son nefesime kadar Aspyce ve onun gibi zalimlerin peşinden gideceğime yemin ettim. Sapkınları ve inanç mücrimlerini cezalandırmak oldu artık yolum."
